author: Staff Reporter
text:
The anti-gangster wing of the Central Crime Branch (CCB) arrested Anandraj, 34, a gangster who has more than 15 cases against him within the Avadi limits, in Pattabhiram, last week.

The police team also seized sickles from the accused. A senior police official of Chennai city said he has been arrested four times under the Goondas Act.
title: CCB arrests history sheeter
